summary: Legacy Version of the Lykaios Race for CBBE, UNP and SOS males
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ea9999][size=3]THIS IS NOT A NEW VERSION OF THIS RACE. [/size][/color][size=3]
[color=#f9cb9c]This is the last stable version of the mod, so don't download it if you already have it![/color][/size]

I made a small mistake and clicked delete on the wrong mod and deleted the Lykaios Race by mistake. So after the last two weeks of being swamped by messages asking what happened to the mod I've decided to re-upload it. So here it is again (for now)...just until the new version is ready to go!

If you want to keep track on how the [color=#93c47d][b]NEW[/b][/color] version of the Lykaios Race is developing, [color=#ea9999]I have started a new tumblr account under the name of krittakitty[/color]. Google it!


[b]Requirements:[/b]

SOS, UNP or CBBE(recommended, not required!)

Vanilla users select the UNP options in the installer. NOTE: you will get some seams on your males, since this was made for SOS not vanilla. but it won't look bad if you''re wearing clothes.)

[color=#f9cb9c]IF YOU HAVE DLC make sure you download and install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard[/url]Â  AFTER installing the Lykaois race. (otherwise your vamps and werewolves may not work)
[/color]
[b]Install:[/b]
Use NMM or MO! easy![/center]

Credits:
Expired for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10165/?]Race Compatibility[/url]
JellyFox for letting me borrow the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62176/?]Fennec Race[/url] tail which is in this version
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3666/?]Femfeet [/url]for the foot meshes
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52918/?]Better claws and Gauntlets [/url]for the hand meshes
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2068651/][b]NerevarineKhajiit[/b][/url] for the Installer
Bethesda for Skyrim!
And to anyone else I may have forgotten who has helped out, you're awesome!
author: KrittaKitty
